english.segment1: Don't cry tonight, my love. You will not bleed alone. I will stand with you. I will stand with you. Don't cry tonight. I will stand with you. Been alone. Far too long. Time to return. You've been alone. For far too long. So long, return. You've been alone. For far too long. So long, return. Don't cry tonight. I will stand with you. You've been alone for far too long. So long, return. These wounds they will not last forever. You've been broken for so long. So long, return. Dead end becomes your second chance. You've been broken for so long. So long, return
